name: Trials of the Artifacts
description:
Welcome to Trials of the Artifacts!

We hope you enjoy TOTAs both if you are looking for a purely competitive 2v2 experience with a player of your caliber or to just have a good time with a family member or friend of different skill level.

Right now we are in an early development stage, with some missing features like audio and menu navigation using controller.

TOTAs is a local multiplayer, so you can play with a friend online using input emulation programs like Parsec.

You need 2 controllers or one controller and one keyboard to play the game and the mouse to select the artifacts and navigate in the menu

This game have been developed by Miguel Muñoz Molina (@itzmumo in twitter) and Javier Casado de Amezúa García (@xtemerz in twitter)

Follow the game twitter in @playTOTAs
